job_details.Functieomschrijving: ## **About the Role** Canvas is one of the core pillars under Michelangelo, Uber's machine learning platform. This team focuses on building and standardizing model dev experiences for ML Engineers and Data Scientists. We build and operate the dev tool known as Canvas, where ML engineers can develop the model solutions for their business needs in all critical ML phases, such as feature engineering, training, serving, ML-Ops, and monitoring. With the Canvas tool, users can iterate quickly and collaboratively during model dev time to build their ML solution, and the solution will be automatically scaled up to run robustly when it is deployed into production. Now we are extending our modeling support to generative AI and large scale models. We are looking for talents with experience building and productionize large scaling models solving business problems. This team is formed by a group of talents with various expertise, such as modeling techniques, batch data processing optimization
job_details.full_text:
Sr Software Engineer (Machine Learning)

## **About the Role** Canvas is one of the core pillars under Michelangelo, Uber's machine learning platform. This team focuses on building and standardizing model dev experiences for ML Engineers and Data Scientists. We build and operate the dev tool known as Canvas, where ML engineers can develop the model solutions for their business needs in all critical ML phases, such as feature engineering, training, serving, ML-Ops, and monitoring. With the Canvas tool, users can iterate quickly and collaboratively during model dev time to build their ML solution, and the solution will be automatically scaled up to run robustly when it is deployed into production. Now we are extending our modeling support to generative AI and large scale models. We are looking for talents with experience building and productionize large scaling models solving business problems. This team is formed by a group of talents with various expertise, such as modeling techniques, batch data processing optimization

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes building and standardizing model development experiences for ML Engineers and Data Scientists, focusing on the entire ML lifecycle from feature engineering to serving and MLOps. While generative AI is mentioned as an extension, the core focus remains on traditional ML model development and productionization within a platform context.

job_tasks.justification: Phrases like 'feature engineering' and 'batch data processing optimization' directly relate to preparing and processing data for machine learning models, which falls under data engineering.
The description repeatedly mentions developing, training, serving, and productionizing models, including both traditional and generative AI/large-scale models, which is the core of modeling tasks.

phrases: building and standardizing model dev experiences
build and operate the dev tool known as Canvas
solution will be automatically scaled up to run robustly when it is deployed into production
job_tasks.justification: The role involves building and operating a development tool ('Canvas') and ensuring ML solutions are scalable and robust for production, indicating software development responsibilities.
The explicit mention of 'ML-Ops', 'serving', and 'deployed into production' points to responsibilities in managing and maintaining models in a production environment.

technologies.justification: Explicitly mentioned as an area of extension for modeling support.
Refers to the development and creation of machine learning models.
Indicates expertise in various methods for building machine learning models.
Refers to the development and productionization of large, complex models.

soft_skills.value: build and standardize model dev experiences
soft_skills.justification: Focuses on creating efficient and standardized development tools for ML engineers and Data Scientists, implying a problem-solving approach to improve workflows.

soft_skills.value: build and operate the dev tool known as Canvas
soft_skills.justification: The responsibility of building and operating a core development tool suggests a need for ownership and initiative.

soft_skills.value: extending our modeling support to generative AI and large scale models
soft_skills.justification: The team's expansion into new areas like generative AI indicates a need for continuous learning and adaptation to new technologies.
